original_text: Your great power has now come down low, into the deep hole of death. People no longer praise you with their harps. Now you will lie on a bed of maggots. A blanket of worms will cover you.
korean_text: 네 영화가 스올에 떨어졌음이여 네 비파 소리까지로다 구더기가 네 아래에 깔림이여 지렁이가 너를 덮었도다

sentences.original_text: Your great power has now come down low
into the deep hole of death
People no longer praise you with their harps
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들은 더 이상 수금으로 당신을 찬양하지 않습니다

sentences.original_text: Now you will lie on a bed of maggots
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 당신은 구더기 침대에 누울 것입니다

sentences.original_text: A blanket of worms will cover you
